page.title: 03Village life
page.content: {The Village hall at Albrough { { The focus of social activity in the village of Albrurgh is the village hall, built in ++++ to replace an older building. An extension was added in 1982. It is here that any meeting of size is held- dances discos whist jumble sales playgroup concerts wedding receptions gymnastics badminton W.I over 60s. It is also used as the polling station. It is run by an elected committee who see to the money raising activities,cleaning,well being,booking and up keep of the hall. Albrough village hall is well know and used by many in the surrounding Hareston, Bungay area.
